page.title: 04NORTH RONALDSAY'S PUNDS
page.content: Punds are kind o'dyke for ca'ing in sheep tae rue.Thure are ten punds bein' oosed noo,thur names are Stromness,Bridesness,Twingness,Macrae, Lenswick,English geo,Trinlay,Backness, Irestaing and geo o'Rue Pund and there is twa no in oose which are the Pund o'Scottigar and Hooking Pund. The sheep ate seaweed moostly ware. all o'the sheep cheep tae thur ain piece o the banks,hid is ca'ed Klow Jung. The punds are oosed for catchen sheep tae ate,rue,worm,dip or tae tak in. Tae find oot what sheep belang tae wha thur is lug tags.Lug tags are cuts in the sheep's lugs.Wur tag is ee bit and a shear in the left lug and four bits cut oot o'the right lug.
